lines.text: Maybe he thought... he could train his abilities!
Well, <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> is a spell for making things stay very still...
So maybe he thought if he could cast it while standing perfectly still, it'd be stronger!
Even if... there were any indication it worked like that, why now?
This clearly ain't the scene for messin' around with magic trainin'.
Hey, there's never a bad time for learning!
And it follows that there's never a bad time to seal yourself in concrete?
